project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeping track of their score and displaying it at the end.

task.name: Define questions and answers variable structure
Implement functionality to present questions and capture user inputs
Develop functionality to display the final score to the user
Write tests for the functionality implemented (including input handling and scoring logic)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function properly
